name: TOFUCHOMP
description:
A personal weekend game jam that we afterward used and experimented on with things we wanted to learn and test before releasing the Jam version with some small fixes and juice!

A cute'em up arcade game where you play as a "Tofu Shiba" against the enemies of the skies and the universe (probably,  why not)!

 Controls:

Left - A key

Right - D key

Up - W key

Down - S key

Shoot - Space key

Bark - C key

Pause - Esc key

PROGRAMS:

Godot 3.5.1 

Aseprite

TEAM

Programming & Design - Pontus Göth https://github.com/redines

Art - David Byström "ArctiqFloe"  https://www.instagram.com/arctiqfloe/

Music & Sound  - Towe Andersson "Bluelle" https://www.instagram.com/_owlette/?hl=en
